creator: dsoleno@infoprise.com
text:
When I set crossContext="true" this version of Tomcat allows Session attributes
from one webapp to be accessed from another.  This is a violation of SRV 7.3
Session Scope.  I have example code to reproduce the error if necessary.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4690 ***
